alert.note: Alert for Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 3:36AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL CHICOT...SOUTHERN WASHINGTON...NORTHWESTERN HUMPHREYS AND NORTHEASTERN SHARKEY COUNTIES... At 336 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Avon, or 11 miles west of Hollandale, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Estill around 350 AM CDT. Hollandale and Panther Burn around 355 AM CDT. Delta City and Darlove around 400 AM CDT. Murphy around 410 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
